tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. The ID Shard, a diamond shaped pendant, swings in darkness.
Thirdrema, a western style town, stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
Wethermon, a metal samurai, stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
Kirin, a metal horse, rears in front of a red moon
A golden Reward Scales shift
Sunraku holds a two handed long sword and strikes at shadowy ghouls that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A headless horse and horseman gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over skeletal monsters
Wethermon draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
The Rebirth Tearjewel lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a moon blade. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
Text, 21, Errands, Cultivation, and Game Progress
A trophy reads Cyber Cup Winner, Kei Uomi. Dozens of awards and trophies fill cabinets.
Various models of VR helmets hang on the wall.
Kei sits in an elaborate VR gaming rig.
Label, Kei Uomi, Pro Gamer, with "Nitro Squad"
He looks at his phone. The 19 year old has short blond hair and green eyes.
He presses a button on his chair and a large visor drops over his head.
The chair reclines and lifts his feet, until he's horizontal.
Katzo, a girl with short blond hair and green eyes, wakes up.
The Serpent's Apple
She takes a bite of strawberry short cake.
Their expressions harden.
She takes a bite of cake.
She spits
Non-Standard Ether Reactor
She sips
She spits
Katzo looks at it
Katzo nods
Pencilgon nods
Lycagon
She throws the reactor at his face.
Walking through the Hidden Garden
The Reward Scales. Item ownership has been transferred.
The reward scales glow. 2 items appear: Tome of Truth, Flower Pin of Bygone Prayers.
He thinks of the Clear Sky Skillbook
The trio make determined expressions
All 3 throw Rock
Pencilgon, Rock. Others, paper.
Ballots read Unique Hunters, Outrage, Wolfgang, Trash Game Alliance, Gold Rush, Pike-Mounted Heads, Pencilgon-chan and Her Errandboys
Pencilgon thinks. The others watch.
They clink drinks
A schwarz wulf member approaches the Serpent's Apple
They run
He banks down an alleyway
Rabbituza Palace. Skill gardener.
He finishes drinking the green skill potion.
He glows gold
4,000 mahni
Forge
She looks down
She looks at her 4 fingered hand. Her eyes shine.
Katzo character model
He thinks of Sunraku and Pencilknight
Sunraku sneezes
Text, 26, Making Oikatzo
